column3: A tandoori six-pc sampler of our signature kababs namely Murgh Malai Murgh Lahsuni & Murgh Tikka
Chicken tikka with a tangy achari flavor
Chunks of malai tikka in an egg blanket
Mutton flattened and served on stone to your delight
Mutton seekh garnished with rich rogan gravy. Had best with a rumali
Six piece sampler of our signature kababs namely Paneer Tikka Veg Seekh Kabab & Khasta Kabab OR Paneer Tikka Veg Seekh Kabab & Dahi Kabab OR Paneer Tikka Veg Seekh Kabab & Hara Bhara Kabab
